LogOutAlert.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
LogOutAlert.message: Signing out will end your current session. Are you sure you want to continue?

CompleteRegistration.title: Complete registration
CompleteRegistration.main_goal_placeholder: Your main goal for using ColdCoach

SignIn.password_len: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
SignIn.password_lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter.
SignIn.password_uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter.
SignIn.password_digits: Password must include at least one digit.
SignIn.password_symbol: Password must include at least one symbol.

SignUp.password_len: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
SignUp.password_lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter.
SignUp.password_uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter.
SignUp.password_digits: Password must include at least one digit.
SignUp.password_symbol: Password must include at least one symbol.

CompleteRegistration.company_name_len: Company name must be at least 3 characters long.
CompleteRegistration.main_goal_len: Main goal must be at least 16 characters long.
